mosparams.description: Database Query is a Mambo query manager.

param.name: DEFAULT_UPLOAD_DIRECTORY
param.label: Upload Directory
param.description: Location where files will be uploaded. The base directory will be Joomla's absolute path.

param.name: MAXIMUM_FILE_SIZE
param.label: Maximum File Size
param.description: The maximum size of files that will be accepted for upload

param.name: FILE_ACCEPT
param.label: MIME Type of File
param.description: The media type that should be accepted by the client browser

param.name: FILE_UPLOAD_REGEX
param.label: File Regular Expression
param.description: The regular expression that will be used to filter file names

param.name: FILES_ABSOLUTE_PATH
param.label: Directory Root
param.description: Indicates if files are to be found under the Joomla root directory

param.name: EXISTING_FILE
param.label: Existing File
param.description: Determine how to resolve conflicts of name

param.name: ESCAPE_OVERRIDE
param.label: Escape Override
param.description: Do not escape the replacement value that will be used in the query

param.name: VARIABLE_TEMPLATE_ID
param.label: Variable Template ID
param.description: Template ID for the variable's template file.
